T02D3639:252b-1: kee ba la nee r'atmya s'a dha nam /
T02D3639:252b-3: bdag med ma rkyang ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3639:252b-4: bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3639:252b-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid du
T02D3639:252b-6: bsgoms pa'i rjes la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aam
T02D3639:252b-7: yig sngon po'i sa bon dang gri gug spro ba
T02D3639:252b-8: la sogs pa sngon du 'gro zhing yongs su gyur
T02D3639:252b-9: pa las ro'i steng du rang gi snying gar zla
T02D3639:252b-10: ba la gnas pa'i skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs
T02D3639:252b-11: kyis bzhugs pa'i bdag med ma sku mdog nag mo
T02D3639:252b-12: zhal gcig ma / dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3639:252b-13: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3639:253a-0: zhal mche ba gtsigs shing ljags bskyod pa @253a * //
T02D3639:253a-1: phyag g-yas na gri gug / g-yon na thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D3639:253a-2: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D3639:253a-3: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3639:253a-4: de'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su aom a'a:h'um zhes pa'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D3639:253a-5: snying gar zla ba la gri gug gi yu bar
T02D3639:253a-6: zla ba la aam yig bltas te sngags 'di bzlas
T02D3639:253a-7: par bya'o // aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u
